[page 554/642]
    vocals  almost  completely  (...)  Removing  vocals  from  "Believe"  is  no  problem  either.”  
Aufr33)
  A  list  of  songs  which  have  vocal  bleed  in  the  instrumental  using  unwa's  v1e  model  
“These
 
songs
 
also
 
present
 
issues
 
after
 
using
 
Mel
 
2024.10
 
and
 
BS
 
2024.08
 
from
 
MVSEP,
 
but
 
the
 
timestamps
 
where
 
the
 
bleed
 
occurs
 
might
 
be
 
different”
 
plus
 
Mel
 
2024.10
 
model
 
might
 
have
 
less
 
of
 
these
 
residues
 
by
 
dca100fb8

issue)

@1:52)
